Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a game-ending infield single with one out in the 11th inning and the New York Yankees outlasted the Kansas City Royals for a 4-3 victory.
Juan Soto launched a go-ahead homer in the sixth for the Yankees.
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees took two of three in a series between playoff contenders.
Kansas City fell 4 1/2 games behind first-place Cleveland in the AL Central.

Luke Weaver struck out three in 1 2/3 hitless innings for the win.
